duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage outside plant, inside plant cable, and Small Cell Network (SCN) construction projects, ensuring compliance with local and state permitting requirements.
Participate in vendor selection, bid process, and customer meetings as a subject matter expert for construction work.
Develop proficiency in creating bill of materials (BOM) and validating gaps during site walks to drive successful material procurement.
Order and manage equipment and material for projects, ensuring project tracking system accuracy.
Develop a working knowledge of permitting and licensing processes in Public and Private right of way, and ensure awareness of issues impacting project completion or cost.
Observe and learn from Network Construction Managers, Field Operations, and Customers, to enhance knowledge and skills in construction management.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent requiredA valid driver’s license required
